titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: ACCIDENT AND EMERGENCY TREATMENT - SECOND (Retired) - Description

p.b: This item has been retired from the NHS Data Model and Dictionary.

div.p: For Commissioning Data Set version 6 onwards there are no restrictions on the number of Secondary Treatment (Accident and Emergency) recorded.

p.b: Access to this version can be obtained by emailing information.standards@nhs.net with "NHS Data Model and Dictionary - Archive Request" in the email subject line.
